name: Way of The Ronin
description:
Way of the ronin!
A simple duel game about a ronin fighting after losing his master, The only way to advance is to defeat his opponents.

Control:
 You need to press (Action Button),  which is supported by [SPACE BUTTON] or [Z] key.

This game is my entry for the #GameZanga10 jam and it's the first time I developed a game using Godot Engine for the web.

Please feel free to share your feedback in the comments =)
